H0.text: where was the flag placed on the moon. Sea of Tranquility

H1.text: where was the flag placed on the moon. Mare Imbrium

H2.text: where was the flag placed on the moon. Crater Copernicus

H3.text: where was the flag placed on the moon. Ocean of Storms

A4.text: Mare Tranquillitatis was the landing site for the first crewed landing on the Moon on July 20, 1969, at 20:18 UTC.

A5.text: The landing area at 0.8°N 23.5°E (Tranquility Base) has been designated Statio Tranquillitatis after Armstrong's name for it.
